ygData.subject: [ANN] Heritrix releases 1.14.2, 2.0.2 now available
ygData.msgSnippet: Heritrix releases 1.14.2 and 2.0.2 are now available at Sourceforge: http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=73833 These are both micro

Subject: [ANN] Heritrix releases 1.14.2, 2.0.2 now available
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=vGVmaTFIQLtznrK8uYAE0e8NxGwMYeA5uygIi0xTRG6Y
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

Heritrix releases 1.14.2 and 2.0.2 are now available at Sourceforge:

http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=73833

These are both 'micro' releases with small bug fixes and improvements.

Online release notes for 1.14.2 with a list of issues addressed are
available at:

http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+1.14.2

Online release notes for 2.0.2 with a list of issues addressed are
available at:

http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix/2.0.2+Release+Notes

Project bug/issue tracking For Heritrix is in a JIRA-based system:

http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER

The project wiki with documentation, project planning, design notes, and 
more is at:

http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix

If you register to report/comment on JIRA issues, that same login will
work for wiki edits and comments, and we welcome people to 'be bold' in 
adding/updating/improving project wiki pages.

- Gordon @ IA
